import React from "react"; import "./BPM.css"; import {Col, Row, Container} from "../Grid/index"; function BPMInput(){ function Calculate(){ let inputVal = document.getElementById("BPM").value; console.log(inputVal); let full = document.getElementById("fullNote"); full.value = inputVal/60; console.log(full.value); full.text = full.value; console.log(full.text); text=full.text; } return (
BPM:
1/64Note
1/32Note
1/16Note
1/8Note
1/4Note
1/2Note
FullNote

) } export default BPMInput;
